Name: Lychee & Blackcurrant Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Originally named "Lychee & Blackcurrant Martini", this is a cocktail of its time - perhaps now best forgotten.  Gin-forward with fruity notes of lychee and blackcurrant.
Nutrition: One serving of Lychee & Blackcurrant Cocktail contains 170 calories
